this fucking garbage i don´t really wanna know why y´  all are int ntr man smh

Guy calls stupid whore, asks her to come out to some convention. She says no because she knows she's a dumb whore that'll cheat again. Guy says he'll ask her boyfriend, and she says she'll go if the guy doesn't get involved with them again. He agrees and she believes, either because she's so incredibly stupid or the author has no idea how people think and interact, probably both. She gets there and she cheats, as usual, then gets all surprised when the guy talks to her boyfriend on the phone and breaks the agreement, as if anyone that's not literally brain dead didn't know that'd happen. Boyfriend sees a picture of dumb whore in cosplay and wonders what's going on. The end. Is there really any point in translating this garbage? I can tell you what will happen in the next one too. She'll be approached again, say "oh no I can't keep cheating",  find some excuse to cheat again, then act like a victim. The artist should stick to drawing because he's too dumb to write.
Damn son, this needs a translation ASAP
